feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.30
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Correction of long translations (French) by @Kevinr99089 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1945
  • Update es.json by @CertainBot in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1948
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1962
  • Uptodown - fix broken web scraping logic (#1956)
  • Add signature info to README (#1957)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.29...v1.1.30

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.31
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1964
  • Update ja.json by @bluefly000 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1965
  • Update README.md by @DwainZwerg in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1972
  • Bugfixes for the "download release assets" button (#1968) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1975

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.30...v1.1.31

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.32
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1977
  • Update wiki links by @Hamster45105 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1980
  • Minor change to German translation (#1986) by @PrivacyAndSecurity in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1990
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1990
  • Improved XAPK Support (#682)
  • Custom user-agent for APKMirror (as per feedback in #1973)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.31...v1.1.32

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.33
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update zh.json by @ygxbnet in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1995
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2008:
  • Fix broken "Download Asset" function for HTML source (#1998)
  • Add "refresh before download" (#1943)
  • Remove WhatsApp, VLC, and Telegram App sources - no longer needed as HTML source sufficient (#1943)
    • Existing entries for these apps will automatically be migrated to the HTML source
    • Relevant configs can be found on https://apps.obtainium.imranr.dev/

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.32...v1.1.33

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.34
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Catch errors when running JSON compat mods - app breaking bug (#2015, #2019) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2021
  • Users with VLC in their apps list, who find that it no longer works, are advised to read and respond to this comment: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/issues/2019#issuecomment-2529701062

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.33...v1.1.34
